createScheme_PM_KISAN.description: Under this scheme, the central government provides ₹6,000 per year in three equal installments to small and marginal farmer families having combined landholding up to 2 hectares. The amount is directly transferred to the bank accounts of the beneficiaries.
createScheme_PM_KISAN.benefitDetails: ₹6,000 per year in 3 installments of ₹2,000 each, directly transferred to farmer's bank account.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for PM-KISAN?
faqs.answer: All small and marginal farmer families with combined landholding up to 2 hectares are eligible.

faqs.question: How much money will I receive?
faqs.answer: ₹6,000 per year in three installments of ₹2,000 each.

faqs.question: PM-KISAN కోసం ఎవరు అర్హులు?
faqs.answer: 2 హెక్టార్ల వరకు భూమి కలిగిన అన్ని చిన్న మరియు సన్నకారు రైతు కుటుంబాలు అర్హులు.

faqs.question: PM-KISAN के लिए कौन पात्र है?
faqs.answer: 2 हेक्टेयर तक भूमि वाले सभी छोटे और सीमांत किसान परिवार पात्र हैं।

createScheme_SOIL_HEALTH.description: The Soil Health Card Scheme provides soil health cards to farmers which carry crop-wise recommendations of nutrients and fertilizers required for the individual farms to help farmers improve productivity through judicious use of inputs.
createScheme_SOIL_HEALTH.benefitDetails: Free soil testing and personalized soil health card with nutrient recommendations for your specific land.

faqs.question: What is a Soil Health Card?
faqs.answer: It is a printed report that a farmer gets for his land which tells him about the nutrient status of the soil and recommendations on dosage of fertilizers.

faqs.question: Is there any cost?
faqs.answer: No, soil testing and the health card are provided free of charge.

createScheme_RYTHU_BANDHU.description: Rythu Bandhu is the Telangana state government's investment support scheme for agriculture. It provides financial assistance of ₹10,000 per acre per year to all land-owning farmers for two crop seasons.
createScheme_RYTHU_BANDHU.benefitDetails: ₹10,000 per acre per year (₹5,000 per season × 2 seasons) for all land-owning farmers in Telangana.

faqs.question: Who can avail Rythu Bandhu?
faqs.answer: All land-owning farmers in Telangana state with pattadar passbook are eligible.

faqs.question: రైతు బంధు ఎవరు పొందవచ్చు?
faqs.answer: పట్టాదార్ పాస్ బుక్ కలిగిన తెలంగాణ రాష్ట్రంలోని అన్ని భూ యజమాని రైతులు అర్హులు.

createScheme_CROP_INSURANCE.description: PMFBY provides crop insurance to farmers at very low premium rates. Kharif crops: 2%, Rabi crops: 1.5%, Commercial and Horticultural: 5% of sum insured.
createScheme_CROP_INSURANCE.benefitDetails: Crop insurance at subsidized premiums (2% Kharif, 1.5% Rabi) covering natural calamities, pests, and diseases.

faqs.question: What crops are covered?
faqs.answer: All notified crops including food crops (cereals, millets, pulses), oilseeds, and commercial/horticultural crops.

faqs.question: What is the premium rate?
faqs.answer: Kharif: 2%, Rabi: 1.5%, Commercial & Horticultural: 5% of the sum insured.

createScheme_BPL_HOUSING.description: PMAY-G provides financial assistance for construction of pucca houses to eligible rural families who are houseless or living in kutcha/dilapidated houses.
createScheme_BPL_HOUSING.benefitDetails: ₹1.20 lakh in plain areas and ₹1.30 lakh in hilly/difficult areas for house construction, plus ₹12,000 for toilet under SBM.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for PMAY-G?
faqs.answer: Rural BPL families who are houseless or living in kutcha/dilapidated houses.

faqs.question: How much assistance is provided?
faqs.answer: ₹1.20 lakh in plains and ₹1.30 lakh in hilly areas.
